name: Minor Injury
desc: -1d to STR/RFX/INT governed Dice Pools. Will naturally heal over the next few days, or faster if treated actively.

name: Medium Injury
desc: -2d to STR/RFX/INT governed Dice Pools. Must be treated relatively soon otherwise further penalties may apply such as infection.

name: Serious Injury
desc: -3d to STR/RFX/INT governed Dice Pools.  The character will die in time if the wound is untreated.

name: Fatal Injury
desc: -4d to STR/RFX/INT governed Dice Pools. Gains the Incapacitated condition and will die very soon if untreated.

name: Death Blow Injury
desc: -5d to STR/RFX/INT governed Dice Pools. Instantly killed.
